properties.entry:
Round 4 Instructions

In this round you will no longer have the ability to communicate or reduce the tokens of other participants.

Each of you has been assigned a number from 1 to 5. The other four players will appear on the screen as blue dots with a white number embedded in the dot. On the top right corner of the screen you can see how many tokens each player has collected.

If you have any questions please raise your hand. Do you have any questions so far?
